name: .MABK
summary: Learn about .MABK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use a MABK file to restore or transfer your Motorola phone, Lenovo phone, or Lenovo tablet's data using Lenovo Moto Smart Assistant (Windows). To do so:
Connect your mobile device to your PC.
Select Import to import your MABK file.
Select Restore and follow the on-screen prompts to restore or transfer your device's data.

You can also manually access the files stored within a MABK file. For example, you can extract the pictures a MABK file contains and then view those pictures on your PC. To extract files from a MABK file:
Select Extract and follow the on-screen prompts to extract files from your MABK file.
